definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: It is the tea of the earth that keep here smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑连结着青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the terms of the earth that kept her smiles in bloom .
sentences.chinese: 大地的泪珠，使她的微笑如花一般灿烂不谢。

sentences.english: It is the tears of the earth that keep her smiles in  bloom.
sentences.chinese: 它是大地的泪点，使她的微笑保持着青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the tears of the earth that keeps her smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑保持青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the tears of the earth that keep her smiles in bloom。
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑保持着青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the tears of the earth that keep her smile in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使它的微笑保持青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the tear of the earth that keeps her smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 因著大地的泪水，使她的微笑常开不谢。

sentences.english: He won't even thank you, leave alone pay you.
sentences.chinese: 他连谢都不谢，甭说付钱给你了。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
(Internet slang) friend (pun on 朋友[peng2 you3])
wish you all the best! (when signing off on a correspondence)
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
life is hard enough as it is; don't burst my bubble (Internet slang)
